about_the_game:
A Hellish World Awaits

Descend into Hell and reclaim your soul in this fast-paced Action RPG roguelike where your choices shape your destiny. Create your hero, pick your class, and fight your way through hordes of demons, slimes, and skeletons in a journey of vengeance and redemption. Collect powerful gear, level up your hero, and unlock new abilities as you venture into a world teeming with danger, where no two runs are ever the same.

Survive the Hordes

Brace yourself for an onslaught of unrelenting enemies in a Survivors-like gameplay loop. Hordes of demons swarm from every direction, forcing you to rely on your skills, gear, and quick thinking to push through increasingly deadly waves. As bosses with unique mechanics emerge to challenge you, only the strongest will survive.

Character Customization

Design your hero to match your vision. From facial features to hair color, every choice allows you to create a character that feels truly yours. Combine appearance customization with class-specific abilities to create a hero tailored to your playstyle.

Endless Loot Progression

Unearth the treasures of Hell as you fight your way through its cursed depths. Discover weapons, armor pieces, and accessories, each imbued with powerful enchantments. Every piece of loot brings you one step closer to conquering the demons.

The gates of Hell await your arrival.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
